flunky

So this is it. The world's most pretentious book club.

Let’s Get It Started

09 Aug 2010

Apparently this really is the world’s most pretentious book club. Look, I’ve got two reasons. First, my dear friend from college says so. And second, there’s only three of us in the damn thing right now. Can you say “exclusive”?

So, if you want to get in on this exclusivity yourself here’s the first book we’re attacking: Gödel, Escher, Bach: An Eternal Golden Braid. And, the reason for the accusations of pretentiousness.
— Matt Kern
